ioformat.images

Class ImageFromRaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioformat.images.ImageFromRaster

  • public class ImageFromRaster
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a method for creating an Image object from a raster with height and width specified.

      ImageFromRaster()

      • createImage

        public static java.awt.Image createImage(int[] raster,
                         int width,
                         int height)
        Generate an Image object for a raster with the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        raster - int[] that is the rater to be turned into an Image object.
        width - Integer that is the image width.
        height - Integer that is the image height.
        Returns:
